mapper.update: update menu set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `left` = #{left,jdbcType=BIT}, `top` = #{top,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, pid, title, url, icon, `status`, sort, `left`, `top`, create_time, modify_time from menu
